titleStmt.title: The description of the singers of Israel, or, The family of love, in a song of Zion. The tune of Flora farewell, or False lover.
titleStmt.author: Rone, Elizabeth.

notesStmt.note: Ms. note at bottom: Print. 4. May. 1680.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library, Chicago, Illinois.
